title: Honor 5
body: Has there been any word what will be given to the people who have honor 5 at end of season.

replies.body: While there may be special rewards for ending a season at honour 5, I wouldn't count on it. They seem to be going the route of rewards for maintaining honour levels similar to the capsules we get now, more than anything tied to the season changes, but anything is possible.
On the honor page it says there are end of Season rewards for honor, but still not sure if there is anything specifically for ending with honor 5 since it just says you get rewards for 3-5.
Oh? I must have missed that. I imagine the higher your level the more capsules you get or something of the like then.

Probably this. I wouldn't imagine there'd be anything "unique" to End-of-Season Honour rewards, as that would more likely encourage "grinding" the system (like what happens with Ranked), which isn't what Riot wants from Honour.
you get honour capsules, which means extra champion shards, which help you fill out your roster quicker.
